titleStmt.title: A prognosticall iudgement of the great coniunction of the two superiour planets, Saturne and Iupiter, which shall happen the 8. day of Aprill. 1583 the fruite of a godly minde, warning us to be mindfull of the sodaine comming of our Lord and Sauiour Christ to iudgement : a comfortable and most necessary discourse, for these miserable and dangerous dayes.
titleStmt.author: R. T. (Robert Tanner)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Dawson, at the Three Cranes in the vintree, at the assignement of R.W.,

notesStmt.note: Epistle dedicatorie and preface signed: Robert Tanner.
Imperfect: at reel 1782:9 t.p. stained; at reel 358:10 t.p. lacking.
Formerly STC 23675; different text from STC 517.9.--Cf. reel guide.
Reproductions of originals in the Bodleian Library (reel 1782) and Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (reel 358).

place.placeName: the Three Cranes in the vintree, at the assignement of R.W.
